summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services. It details various charges, discounts, and shipment summaries related to Epstein's account, including multiple shipments made in March 2004. The invoice highlights the total amount due and provides contact information for inquiries.

events.title: FedEx Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice to Jeffrey E. Epstein detailing shipping charges for various packages sent in March 2004.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice number is 1-665-01443, dated March 22, 2004.
Total charges on the invoice amount to USD 224.77.
The invoice includes details of multiple shipments made by Epstein in March 2004.
Several recipients of packages sent by Epstein are mentioned, including Larry Summers and Michelle Campos.
The document indicates that Epstein saved $19.96 in discounts during this billing period.
